references: D. S. Mitrinovic et al., Handbook of Number Theory, Kluwer, p. 14.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: sigma(a(n)) = A062402(sigma(n)) or phi(A062402(n)) = a(phi(n)). - _Labos Elemer_, Jul 22 2004
maple: with(numtheory); A062401:=n->phi(sigma(n)); seq(A062401(n), n=1..50); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Apr 07 2014
prog: (PARI) vector(150, n, eulerphi(sigma(n)))(PARI) for (n=1, 10000, write("b062401.txt", n, " ", eulerphi(sigma(n))) ) \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 07 2009(Haskell)a062401 = a000010 . a000203  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 04 2013
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 08 2001
